## Objective
Primary objective and expected outcome.

## Success Criteria

- Criterion 2
- Criterion 3

## Goals

- User experience goal
- Technical goal

## Pain Points
- Pain point 1
- Pain point 2

## In Scope
- Included item 1
- Included item 2
- Included item 3

## Out of Scope
- Excluded item 1
- Excluded item 2

## Functional Requirements
**Must Have:**
- Requirement 1
- Requirement 2

**Should Have:**
- Requirement 1

**Nice to Have:**
- Requirement 1

## Non-Functional Requirements

- Performance: [Target]

feature.name: Integration Feature
feature.title: üîó Integration Feature
feature.description: Template for integration or connectivity features.
feature.content:
## Feature Name
[Integration Name]

## Description
Description of the integration and what systems it connects.

## Problem Statement
What workflow or data gap does this integration address?

## Objective
Enable seamless data flow and workflow automation between systems.

## Success Criteria
- Data syncs accurately
- Users can configure without technical help
- Error rate below [Target]%

## Goals
- Eliminate manual data entry
- Improve data consistency
- Reduce workflow time

## Pain Points
- Manual copy/paste between systems
- Data inconsistencies
- Time wasted on repetitive tasks

## In Scope
- Initial sync setup
- Bi-directional sync
- Field mapping configuration

## Out of Scope
- Legacy system support
- Custom transformations

## Functional Requirements
**Must Have:**
- Authentication with target system
- Basic field mapping
- Sync status visibility

**Should Have:**
- Conflict resolution options
- Sync scheduling

**Nice to Have:**
- Advanced filtering

## Non-Functional Requirements
**Must Have:**
- API rate limit compliance
- Data encryption in transit

**Should Have:**
- Sync latency under [X] seconds

feature.name: UX Improvement Feature
feature.title: ‚ú® UX Improvement Feature
feature.content:
## Feature Name
[UX Improvement Name]

## Description
Description of the UX improvement and affected user flows.

## Problem Statement
What usability issues or friction points exist today?

## Objective
Improve user satisfaction and task completion rates.

## Success Criteria
- Task completion time reduced by [X]%
- User satisfaction score increases
- Support tickets for this area decrease

## Goals
- Simplify user workflow
- Reduce cognitive load
- Improve accessibility

## Pain Points
- Confusing navigation
- Too many clicks to complete task
- Unclear feedback/status

## In Scope
- Redesigned workflow
- Updated UI components
- Improved feedback messages

## Out of Scope
- Backend performance changes
- New functionality beyond UX

## Functional Requirements
**Must Have:**
- Clearer visual hierarchy
- Reduced steps to complete task
- Accessible to keyboard users

**Should Have:**
- Progress indicators
- Undo capability

**Nice to Have:**
- Customizable layout

## Non-Functional Requirements
**Must Have:**
- Page load under [X] seconds
- WCAG 2.1 AA compliance

**Should Have:**
- Responsive design for mobile

feature.name: Performance Feature
feature.title: ‚ö° Performance Feature
feature.content:
## Feature Name
[Performance Optimization Name]

## Description
Description of the performance improvement and technical approach.

## Problem Statement
What performance issues are users experiencing?

## Objective
Improve system responsiveness and reduce resource consumption.

## Success Criteria
- Response time reduced by [X]%
- Throughput increased to [Target]
- Resource usage reduced by [X]%

## Goals
- Faster page loads
- Better scalability
- Reduced infrastructure costs

## Pain Points
- Slow page loads
- Timeouts during peak usage
- High server costs

## In Scope
- Query optimization
- Caching implementation
- Code optimization

## Out of Scope
- Infrastructure changes
- Feature changes

## Functional Requirements
**Must Have:**
- No change to existing functionality
- Performance monitoring in place
- Rollback capability

**Should Have:**
- A/B testing support
- Gradual rollout

**Nice to Have:**
- Performance dashboard

## Non-Functional Requirements
**Must Have:**
- P95 latency under [X]ms
- Zero data loss
- Backward compatible

**Should Have:**
- Auto-scaling support

feature.name: Security Feature
feature.title: üîí Security Feature
feature.description: Template for security enhancements and compliance features.
feature.content:
## Feature Name
[Security Feature Name]

## Description
Description of the security enhancement and protection it provides.

## Problem Statement
What security vulnerabilities or compliance gaps exist?

## Objective
Enhance security posture and meet compliance requirements.

## Success Criteria
- Vulnerability addressed
- Compliance requirement met
- Security audit passed

## Goals
- Protect user data
- Meet regulatory requirements
- Reduce security risk

## Pain Points
- Known vulnerability
- Compliance gap
- Security audit finding

## In Scope
- Security control implementation
- Testing and validation
- Documentation

## Out of Scope
- Unrelated security items
- Infrastructure changes

## Functional Requirements
**Must Have:**
- Security control active
- Audit logging
- Admin configuration

**Should Have:**
- User notification
- Reporting

**Nice to Have:**
- Self-service security settings

## Non-Functional Requirements
**Must Have:**
- [Compliance standard] compliant
- Data encrypted at rest and in transit
- No performance degradation

**Should Have:**
- Security monitoring integration

feature.name: Analytics Feature
feature.title: üìä Analytics Feature
feature.description: Template for analytics, reporting, and insights features.
feature.content:
## Feature Name
[Analytics Feature Name]

## Description
Description of the analytics capability and insights provided.

## Problem Statement
What visibility or insights are users lacking?

## Objective
Provide actionable insights to improve decision-making.

## Success Criteria
- Users can answer key business questions
- Report generation time acceptable
- Data accuracy validated

## Goals
- Enable data-driven decisions
- Reduce time to insights
- Improve business outcomes

## Pain Points
- No visibility into [area]
- Manual report generation
- Inconsistent metrics

## In Scope
- Dashboard creation
- Key metrics definition
- Export capabilities

## Out of Scope
- Real-time analytics
- Predictive analytics

## Functional Requirements
**Must Have:**
- Core metrics display
- Date range filtering
- Data export

**Should Have:**
- Drill-down capability
- Scheduled reports

**Nice to Have:**
- Custom dashboard builder
- Alerts and notifications

## Non-Functional Requirements
**Must Have:**
- Report loads under [X] seconds
- Data refreshes within [X] hours

**Should Have:**
- Handle [X] concurrent users
- Mobile-friendly display
